Webcomponents

This is a webcomponents experiment. Read more about about the background and the technologies used as https://github.com/timoschinkel/webcomponents.

Thumbs

A simple webcomponent that contains scoped functionality. In this specific case you can add the thumbs-component to a page and you will immediately get a thumb up - thumb down functionality.

Attributes

Within the component we can gather information and send a request to a backend environment. In order to indicate where to send the data to we can add an attribute url

Slots

Attributes are great for when you want to attach properties that are required for logic to a component. Sometimes however you want to communicate some more information, maybe dynamic content with HTML markup. For that you can use slots. For our thumb up - thumb down component we might want to be able to specify the success message.

An interesting side effect of using slots, is that slots use any CSS from the page's scope. That means that the text color is coming from the page, and not from the webcomponent.
